price: Sila gara Gooftaa keetii hin ilaallee akkamitti Gaaddisa akka diriirse ? Odoo fedhee turaa isa taasisa ture. Ergasii Aduu (jiraachuu) isaa (gaaddisaa) irratti ragaa taasifne.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنٗا ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā rabbika kayfa madda al-ẓila walaw shāa lajaʿalahu sākinan thumma jaʿalnā al-shamsa ʿalayhi dalīlan
